text: SOKO – Der Prozess is a German five-part crossover between all ZDF SOKO- series. The teams from the SOKOs 5113, Cologne, Leipzig, Stuttgart and Wismar clarify to the murder of a policeman and move off in a criminal milieu in which to rule their own law and its own order. It was broadcast from 30 September 2013 to 4 October 2013, on German television channel ZDF. ==Plot== The car mechanic Peter Riedl was killed in his Munich workshop. Through a hidden tattoo is clear that Riedl was a member of the Munich Chapters of the MC Bullsharks. One trail leads to the leader of the chapter, Frank Wellinger. Another trail leads to the lawyer Paul Korte. He represents the co-plaintiff in a process that takes place in a few days in Leipzig. The dead man was there a witness for the defense. In the process, the head of the Cologne chapter of the Bullsharks, Alex Krüger, is indicted. ==Cast== ===SOKO-Teams=== {| class="wikitable" | bgcolor="#add8e6" | Actor | bgcolor="#add8e6" | Role-name | bgcolor="#add8e6" | Function |- |style="background-color:#DFEEEF" align="center" colspan="3"| SOKO 5113 |- | Gerd Silberbauer || Arthur Bauer || Kriminalhauptkommissar |- | Michel Guillaume || Theo Renner || Kriminaloberkommissar |- | Bianca Hein || Katharina Hahn || Kriminaloberkommissarin |- | Joscha Kiefer || Dominik Morgenstern || Kriminalkommissar |- | Florian Odendahl || Dr. Maximilian Weissenböck || Coroner |- |style="background-color:#DFEEEF" align="center" colspan="3" | Cologne P.D. |- | Sissy Höfferer || Karin Reuter || Kriminalhauptkommissarin |- | Pierre Besson || Matti Wagner || Kriminalhauptkommissar |- | Lukas Piloty || Jonas Fischer || Kriminalkommissar |- | Kerstin Landsmann || Vanessa Haas || Kriminalkommissarin |- | Thomas Clemens || Dr. Philip Kraft || Coroner |- |style="background-color:#DFEEEF" align="center" colspan="3" | SOKO Wismar |- |Udo Kroschwald || Jan-Hinrich Reuter || Erster Kriminalhauptkommissar |- |Claudia Schmutzler || Katrin Börensen || Kriminalhauptkommissarin |- |Li Hagman || Leena Virtanen || Constable/ Poliisikonstaapeli |- |Jonas Laux || Nils Theede || Kriminaloberkommissar |- |Mathias Junge || Kai Timmermann || Polizeihauptmeister |- |Silke Matthias || Silke Schwarz || Kriminaltechnikerin |- |Katharina Blaschke || Dr. Helene Sturbeck || Coroner |- |style="background-color:#DFEEEF" align="center" colspan="3"| Stuttgart Homicide |- | Astrid M.
